name: Squishy (Louis)
description:
This prototype was built in 3 days from scratch using C++ and OpenGL, and was developed to showcase some of the features of a game I'm working on. The idea came when I was throwing a round, green plush toy in the air and trying to catch it, I thought it might be a fun game, so I threw this together. The source-code can be found at https://github.com/LouisDevelopment/SquishyTechDemo

The game will be focused on "Squishy", a virtual pet who likes to be thrown around and played with. You will be able to feed him, take him on walks, play fetch with him and enter him into tournaments. 

Features of this tech-demo include "Squishy" the simple soft-body virtual pet, and balls that can be added to the scene to be played with. Squishy uses the first iteration of my soft-body engine. I'm sure there will be changes to be made, but as it is currently, it works well enough.
